content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Thousands of giant insects and aliens once again ravage the earth, and only the Earth Defense Force can stop them. Defend the city of New Detroit against an infestation bigger and meaner than ever before. Destroy these monsters at all costs, even if it means turning entire city blocks into rubble! Welcome to the ultimate in arcade shooter satisfaction on a gigantic modern scale! EDF! EDF! EDF!

Key Features

Intense squad based action with 3 player online multiplayer start to finish, and 6 player survival mode

Split Screen Co-Op for local multiplayer action
Hardcore ‘Inferno Mode’ for elite gamers

EDF’s trademark gameplay: Killing thousands of swarming giant bugs and robots in a completely destroyable city

Over 300 weapons: assault rifles, rocket launchers, sniper rifles, energy weapons, and more!

4 upgradeable armor types: Jetpack, Battle, Tactical, and Trooper

Massive replayability through arcade style scoring, tons of weapons to collect, and multiple difficulty levels in every game mode!

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
